name: suffix
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a letter or group of letters added at the end of a word to make a new word

example.eg: The suffix "-ness" added to the end of the word "sweet" forms the word "sweetness", changing an adjective into a noun.
example.egtrans: 后缀 -ness加在 sweet 之后构成 sweetness，把形容词变成了名词。
